body:
**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?** (choose one):
bug
<!--
If this is a BUG REPORT, please:
  - Fill in as much of the template below as you can.  If you leave out
    information, we can't help you as well.

If this is a FEATURE REQUEST, please:
  - Describe *in detail* the feature/behavior/change you'd like to see.

In both cases, be ready for followup questions, and please respond in a timely
manner.  If we can't reproduce a bug or think a feature already exists, we
might close your issue.  If we're wrong, PLEASE feel free to reopen it and
explain why.
-->

**Kubernetes version** (use `kubectl version`):

Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"6", GitVersion:"v1.6.1", GitCommit:"b0b7a323cc5a4a2019b2e9520c21c7830b7f708e", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2017-04-03T23:37:30Z", GoVersion:"go1.8", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"darwin/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"6", GitVersion:"v1.6.0", GitCommit:"fff5156092b56e6bd60fff75aad4dc9de6b6ef37", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2017-03-28T16:24:30Z", GoVersion:"go1.7.5", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}

**Environment**:

- **OS** (e.g. from /etc/os-release):  Ubuntu 16.04
- **Kernel** (e.g. `uname -a`): Linux node-105 4.4.0-72-generic #93-Ubuntu SMP Fri Mar 31 14:07:41 UTC 2017 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

**What happened**:

I am seeing these logs in `/var/log/syslog` of nodes:

```
Apr 19 10:55:28 node-105 kubelet[31160]: E0419 10:55:28.336117   31160 event.go:259] Could not construct reference to: '&v1.ObjectReference{Kind:"Pod", Namespace:"scrm", Name:"app-525647683-nnph4", UID:"774fff5a-24a0-11e7-84aa-d4bed9ebd3f3", APIVersion:"v1", ResourceVersion:"2251743", FieldPath:"spec.containers{app}"}' due to: 'object does not implement the List interfaces'. Will not report event: 'Warning' 'Unhealthy' 'Readiness probe failed: Get http://10.43.0.0:8080/health: dial tcp 10.43.0.0:8080: getsockopt: connection refused'
Apr 19 10:55:29 node-105 kubelet[31160]: E0419 10:55:29.336172   31160 event.go:259] Could not construct reference to: '&v1.ObjectReference{Kind:"Pod", Namespace:"scrm", Name:"app-525647683-nnph4", UID:"774fff5a-24a0-11e7-84aa-d4bed9ebd3f3", APIVersion:"v1", ResourceVersion:"2251743", FieldPath:"spec.containers{app}"}' due to: 'object does not implement the List interfaces'. Will not report event: 'Warning' 'Unhealthy' 'Readiness probe failed: Get http://10.43.0.0:8080/health: dial tcp 10.43.0.0:8080: getsockopt: connection refused'
Apr 19 10:55:30 node-105 kubelet[31160]: E0419 10:55:30.336123   31160 event.go:259] Could not construct reference to: '&v1.ObjectReference{Kind:"Pod", Namespace:"scrm", Name:"app-525647683-nnph4", UID:"774fff5a-24a0-11e7-84aa-d4bed9ebd3f3", APIVersion:"v1", ResourceVersion:"2251743", FieldPath:"spec.containers{app}"}' due to: 'object does not implement the List interfaces'. Will not report event: 'Warning' 'Unhealthy' 'Readiness probe failed: Get http://10.43.0.0:8080/health: dial tcp 10.43.0.0:8080: getsockopt: connection refused'
Apr 19 10:55:31 node-105 kubelet[31160]: E0419 10:55:31.336131   31160 event.go:259] Could not construct reference to: '&v1.ObjectReference{Kind:"Pod", Namespace:"scrm", Name:"app-525647683-nnph4", UID:"774fff5a-24a0-11e7-84aa-d4bed9ebd3f3", APIVersion:"v1", ResourceVersion:"2251743", FieldPath:"spec.containers{app}"}' due to: 'object does not implement the List interfaces'. Will not report event: 'Warning' 'Unhealthy' 'Readiness probe failed: Get http://10.43.0.0:8080/health: dial tcp 10.43.0.0:8080: getsockopt: connection refused'
```

**What you expected to happen**:

No these logs, events reported successfully.

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to cleaning up code, process, or technical debt.
labels.name: kind/cleanup

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Node.
labels.name: sig/node

title: kubelet failed to report some events
